jutils

Class GuiInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • jutils.GuiInfo

  • public class GuiInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    The GuiInfo class brings together some common Window functionality for programs using windowed interfaces.

      • GuiInfo

        public GuiInfo(java.lang.String title,

        Parameters:
        title - String value of the title to set for this window
        iconURLs - String Array of icons to be used for this window

    • Method Detail

      • initLookAndFeel

        public java.lang.String initLookAndFeel(java.lang.String inLookAndFeel)
        Sets the UIManager's look and feel. Should be called before showing the GUI.

        Valid values are :

        • null (use the default)
        • "Metal"
        • "System"
        • "Windows7"
        • "Motif"
        • "GTK+"
        Parameters:
        inLookAndFeel - string value of look and feel to implement
        Returns:
        String value of actual value used

      • getImageList

        Returns:
        then arrayList of the possible images for the window icon

      • getAllVersions

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAllVersions(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> vlist)
        Returns list of mapped pairs of class file names and the version number. It also adds all called routines to the list. If the class file name and version is already in the list, it does not add them, it simply returns.
        Parameters:
        vlist - Map of the current class/versions to be appended to
        Returns:
        Map of the class/version values for this and all called routines
